steps.name: Research and define the core concepts: Vibe Coding and Spec Driven Development.
Define the roles and responsibilities for the Product Manager, Software Engineer, and UX/UI Designer agents.
Create the documentation structure for each agent, including the specific files requested (PRD.md, STRUCTURE.md, etc.).
Plan the overall project directory structure to accommodate the agent documentation and the application source code.
Create the PRD.md file for the Product Manager agent.
Create the STRUCTURE.md file for the Product Manager agent.
Create the PROJECT_RULES.md file for the Product Manager agent.
Create the CODING_CONVENTIONS.md file for the Software Engineer agent.
Create the TECH_STACK.md file for the Software Engineer agent, detailing the use of Vite, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.
Create the DATABASE_SCHEMA.md file for the Software Engineer agent, specifying the use of Supabase.
Create the DESIGN_SYSTEM.md file for the UX/UI Designer agent.
Create the UI_SPEC.md file for the UX/UI Designer agent.
Create the UX_FLOW.md file for the UX/UI Designer agent.
Set up the initial project structure with directories for agents and the application.
Define the role and responsibilities of the GITHUB agent.
Create the documentation structure for the GITHUB agent.
Update AGENTS.md to include the new GITHUB agent.
Update STRUCTURE.md to reflect the new agent's documentation directory.
